attributes.action: Getv the UKI out of the European Community or at least renegotiate
attributes.additional_details: When I voted for the Common Market there was no mention of a Uropean Parliament. European integration is a farce. Fraance wwiould demand cfertain rights as we would for its defence industries, social program programs are different and unlikely to be changed. iI agree with a flat playing filed for a common market but this lot are sso biased we have no chance of getting anywhere. Finally, we should get out of the European Human rights legislation and create our own. Call the bluff of the LIberl Democrats and call an election on this issue alone
